data.name: ActiveFighter
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: AGRI
data.comment: A contraction of Agriculture, ideally 3 letters

data.name: AutoDock1
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: AutoDock2
data.value: Unterstützung der automatischen Identifizierung von Abrechnungen
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: AutoDock3
data.value: Wechseln Sie nicht zu einer externen Kamera
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement
data.source: Do not switch to external camera

data.name: CMD
data.comment: A contraction of Command, ideally 3 letters

data.name: Distance
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: DockingApproved
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement {0} int, the pad number assigned

data.name: DockingDenied
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: DockingRequested
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: Government
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: HAB
data.comment: A contraction of Habitat, ideally 3 letters

data.name: HasInterstellar
data.comment: Shown when approaching a settlement

data.name: HelpFoot0
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot

data.name: HelpFoot1
data.value: 1. Gehen Sie zur Mitte eines Landeplatzes und gehen Sie in die Hocke
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot
data.source: 1. Walk to the center of any landing pad and crouch

data.name: HelpFoot2
data.value: 2. Lege deinen linken Fuß über die mittleren Rillen
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot
data.source: 2. Place your left foot over the the center grooves

data.name: HelpFoot3
data.value: 3. Zeigen Sie mit den Chevrons zu Ihrer Linken
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot
data.source: 3. Face with the chevrons ahead to your left

data.name: HelpFoot4
data.value: 4. Zielen Sie auf das Ende des Grooves vor Ihnen
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot
data.source: 4. Aim at the end of the groove ahead of you

data.name: HelpFoot5
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot {0} string, the non-localized command to type

data.name: HelpFoot6
data.value: Weitere Informationen finden Sie im Wiki
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot
data.source: See the wiki for more info

data.name: HelpShip1
data.value: Die Abrechnung wird nach der nächsten Aktion identifiziert
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed in a ship
data.source: Settlement will be identified after next action

data.name: HelpShip2
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed in a ship

data.name: HelpShip3
data.comment: Shown when landed and help is needed in a ship {0} string, the non-localized command to type
